entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a technology company whose mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. They generate revenue by offering a wide range of cloud-based and other services to people and businesses; licensing and supporting an array of software products; designing, manufacturing, and selling devices; and delivering relevant online advertising to a global audience.

entities.name: ZENIMAX MEDIA INC.
entities.description: ZeniMax Media Inc. is the parent company of Bethesda Softworks LLC. It was acquired by Microsoft Corporation on March 9, 2021, for a total purchase price of $8.1 billion.

entities.name: BETHESDA SOFTWORKS LLC
entities.description: Bethesda Softworks LLC is a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc. It became part of Microsoft Corporation's More Personal Computing segment after the acquisition of ZeniMax Media Inc.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft Corporation acquired ZeniMax Media Inc. on March 9, 2021, for a total purchase price of $8.1 billion.
Bethesda Softworks LLC is a subsidiary of ZeniMax Media Inc.
Bethesda Softworks LLC became part of Microsoft Corporation's More Personal Computing segment after the acquisition of ZeniMax Media Inc.
